code: import axios from"axios";var request=axios.create({baseURL:"http://salex-nc-news-server.herokuapp.com/api"});export var getTopics=function getTopics(){return request.get("/topics").then(function(_ref){var data=_ref.data;return data.topics;});};export var getArticles=function getArticles(_ref2){var topic=_ref2.topic,sort_by=_ref2.sort_by,order=_ref2.order;return request.get("/articles",{params:{topic:topic,sort_by:sort_by,order:order}}).then(function(_ref3){var data=_ref3.data;return data.articles;});};export var getSingleArticle=function getSingleArticle(_ref4){var article_id=_ref4.article_id;return request.get("/articles/".concat(article_id)).then(function(_ref5){var data=_ref5.data;return data.article;});};export var getComments=function getComments(_ref6){var article_id=_ref6.article_id;return request.get("/articles/".concat(article_id,"/comments")).then(function(_ref7){var data=_ref7.data;return data.comments;});};export var patchVotes=function patchVotes(inc_votes,id,type){return request.patch("/".concat(type,"/").concat(id),{inc_votes:inc_votes}).then(function(_ref8){var data=_ref8.data;return data;});};export var postComment=function postComment(newComment,article_id){return request.post("/articles/".concat(article_id,"/comments"),newComment).then(function(_ref9){var data=_ref9.data;return data.comment;});};export var deleteComment=function deleteComment(comment_id){return request.delete("/comments/".concat(comment_id));};
